pages.text: $(o)Nobody knows who built them, but in the Nether there are numerous structures.$(br2)$(o)In the depths of the Nether, a magnicent Blacksmith can be found.$(br2)$(o)It is said that numerous weapons and armor were forged here using the most resistant material, the Ancient Debris.

$(o)But beware, there is still a giant guardian defending this smithy abandoned by its creators long ago.$(br2)$(o)It will destroy its great intruders thanks to its immeasurable strength.$(br2)$(o)No matter how much you pray for your life, this unfeeling creature will show no mercy.
